mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id,subject,create_time,update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId},#{subject},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update clazz set name = #{name}, room = #{room}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, master_id = #{masterId},subject = #{subject},update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from clazz c where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select c.id, c.name, c.room, c.begin_date, c.end_date, c.master_id, c.create_time, c.update_time, CASE when c.begin_date > NOW() then '未开班' when NOW() > c.end_date then '已结课' else '在读中' END AS status, e.name AS masterName from clazz c left join emp e on e.id = c.master_id
c.name like concat('%',#{clazzQueryParam.name},'%')
and c.end_date between #{clazzQueryParam.begin} and #{clazzQueryParam.end}
order by c.end_date
select count(*) from student where clazz_id = #{id}
